from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
ground = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, 0, 4), radius=0.5, color=color.blue, make_trail=True)

initial_velocity = 5
height = vector(0, 0, 4)
g = vector(0, -9.81, 0)

def update_position():
    ball.pos = height
    ball.velocity = vector(initial_velocity, 0, 0)
    while ball.pos.y >= 0:
        rate(100)
        ball.velocity += g
        ball.pos += ball.velocity
    ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y

def on_change_Angle_I(value):
    global initial_velocity
    initial_velocity = value
    update_position()

def on_change_Gyroscope_I(value):
    global height
    height = vector(value[0], value[1], value[2])
    update_position()

update_position()
